thread.title: Before The Tragedy: Jamie Lynn Spears’ Daughter Maddie Hunts, Drives ATV
thread.title_full: Before The Tragedy: Jamie Lynn Spears’ Daughter Maddie Hunts, Drives ATV

author: Gina Bacchiocchi
title: Before The Tragedy: Jamie Lynn Spears’ Daughter Maddie Hunts, Drives ATV
text: Thank you for subscribing! 1 of 10 Far from Hollywood: In the weeks before Jamie Lynn Spears’ daughter Maddie was allegedly seriously injured in an ATV accident during a hunting trip, the little girl lived a wild country life in Louisiana and Tennessee. See photos of the 8-year-old hunting and driving an ATV with her family. A photo posted by Jamie Lynn Spears (@jamielynnspears) on Nov 26, 2016 at 9:34am PST Maddie, who reportedly became submerged under water for several minutes following the terrifying accident on Sunday, often hunted with her mom Jamie Lynn, 25, and stepfather, Jamie Watson. The onetime teen mom posed with her little girl late last year. A photo posted by Jamie (@jamiewatson985) on Dec 24, 2016 at 10:45am PST On Christmas Eve, Maddie hunted with aunt Britney's sons Preston, 11, and Jayden, 10, on New Orleans' Lake St. Catherine. A photo posted by Jamie (@jamiewatson985) on Nov 24, 2016 at 11:48am PST Ten weeks before the accident, Maddie drove her own ATV with mom Jamie Lynn in the passenger seat. A photo posted by Jamie (@jamiewatson985) on Dec 31, 2016 at 1:56pm PST Watson, 34, is an avid duck hunter, and often showed off his spoils to his stepdaughter. A photo posted by Jamie Lynn Spears (@jamielynnspears) on Nov 24, 2016 at 3:25pm PST Maddie lives with her mom and stepdad in the Spears' native Kentwood, Louisiana, and Nashville, Tennessee, where the former child star is pursuing a country music career . She also lives part-time with her father Casey Aldridge, 28, stepmom April, and lookalike half sister Skylar, 2, in Mississippi. (Spears and Aldridge split after an on-off engagement in 2010.) A photo posted by Jamie Lynn Spears (@jamielynnspears) on Nov 13, 2016 at 10:29am PST Jamie Lynn and Britney's mother, Lynne, 61, asked her friends for prayers this morning on her private Facebook page. "Please keep them coming," she said. A photo posted by Jamie Lynn Spears (@jamielynnspears) on Oct 29, 2016 at 2:27pm PDT Meanwhile, Jamie Lynn's uncle R.A. Covington told Radar that Maddie was "doing okay" as of Monday morning. A photo posted by Jamie Lynn Spears (@jamielynnspears) on Oct 8, 2016 at 6:11pm PDT For the latest news on Maddie's recovery, keep checking Radar. We pay for juicy info! Do you have a story for RadarOnline.com? Email us at tips@radaronline.com, or call us at 800-344-9598 any time, day or night. X
